description: This CSS file contains theme management variables and styles for the App component of a React frontend, supporting both light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class, applies central styling including background color and text color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, centers content and applies background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, includes animation and sizing.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.

methods.name: keyframes App-logo-spin
methods.description: Defines the spin animation for the application logo.
